headline.main: AIR WAR CONTINUES FOR GUADALCANAL; Our Bombers Strike Again at New Japanese Base on Kolombangara Island KEEP UP MUNDA BATTERING Enemy Raiders Visit Henderson Field, Lose Plane -- Our Troops Kill 62 More Japanese

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 1 -- Three new bombing forays by American airplanes against advanced Japanese bases and one air stroke against Guadalcanal by the enemy were reported in a communique issued here today by the Navy Department.
abstract: US planes raid Kolombangara Is and Munda area; Jap planes raid Guadalcanal; earlier raids on Guadalcanal described; US ground troops kill or capture more Japanese
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 1 -- Three new bombing forays by American airplanes against advanced Japanese bases and one air stroke against Guadalcanal by the enemy were reported in a communique issued here today by the Navy Department....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
